identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' style betting automation dashboard that feels like a high-frequency trading terminal. Precision, speed, and stealth.
principles: Content: Data is the hero. Legibility of odds and logs is paramount.
Contrast: High contrast neon against deep void backgrounds.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Key Metrics

mono.usage: Odds, Wager Amounts, Logs, IDs, Timestamps

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(10, 10, 15, 0.6); border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.08);

layout.spacing: Compact but breathable. Use p-4 for cards, gap-4 for grids.

motion.micro_interactions: Hover: Brighten border, slight glow. Active: Scale 0.98.
motion.loading: Skeleton loaders with a scanning shimmer effect.

buttons.style: Sharp edges or rounded-sm. Primary: Neon Green bg, Black text. Secondary: Ghost with border.
buttons.hover: Glow effect on primary. Border brighten on secondary.

cards.style: Glassmorphism background. Thin border. No heavy shadows.
cards.header: Border-bottom separator. Mono font for title if technical.

inputs.style: Dark bg (muted). Border-input. Focus: Ring-primary (Neon Green).
inputs.font: Manrope for text, JetBrains Mono for numbers.

charts.style: Minimal axes. Neon lines. Gradient fills (opacity 0.2 to 0). Tooltip: Glassmorphism.

tables.style: Compact. Row hover: bg-white/5. Header: Uppercase, tracking-wider, text-muted-foreground.
tables.font: JetBrains Mono for all data cells.

sections.name: Status Bar
sections.content: Connection Status (Green Dot), Balance (Big Mono Font), Active Bets Count

sections.name: Live Feed
sections.content: Scrolling log of bot actions (Place Bet, Skip, Error)

betting_rules.right: Editor Panel (Form with sliders, inputs, logic builders)

images.description: Abstract dark streaks for login background

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px. Small size (w-4 h-4) for density.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/chivo', '@fontsource/manrope', '@fontsource/jetbrains-mono' to package.json and import in index.js.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Neon Terminal' color palette (convert HSL values).
3. OVERRIDE CSS: Replace contents of index.css with the dark mode variables provided.
4. CREATE LAYOUT: Build a 'DashboardLayout' component with a fixed sidebar and top bar.
5. USE SHADCN: Use Card, Table, Form, Input, Button, Badge, Dialog, ScrollArea.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (e.g., 'login-btn', 'place-bet-btn').
7. CHARTS: Use Recharts for the P/L graph. Style it with the primary neon green color.
8. LOGS: Create a 'LogViewer' component that looks like a terminal (black bg, green mono text).
9. NO INTER: Do not use Inter font. Use Manrope for UI and Chivo for Headings.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
